strings.drefExportDownloadBudget: Click here to download the budget file
strings.situationUpdateSectionHeading: Provide any updates in the situation since the field report and explain what is expected to happen.
strings.anticipatoryActionsHeading: Why your National Society is acting now and what criteria is used to launch this operation.
strings.dateWhenTriggerWasMetHeading: Date when the trigger was met
strings.changingTimeFrameLabel: Are you changing the timeframe of the operation
strings.changingStrategyLabel: Are you changing the operational strategy
strings.changingTargetPopulationLabel: Are you changing the target population of the operation
strings.changingLocationLabel: Are you changing the geographical location
strings.changingBudgetLabel: Are you making changes to the budget
strings.secondAllocationLabel: Are you requesting an additional allocation?
strings.changeSummaryLabel: Please explain the summary of changes and justification
strings.specifiedTriggerMetLabel: Please explain how the operation is transitioning from Anticipatory to Response
strings.movementPartnersActionsHeading: IFRC Network Actions Related To The Current Event
strings.icrcActionsHeading: ICRC Actions Related To The Current Event
strings.otherActionsHeading: Other Actors Actions Related To The Current Event
strings.majorCoordinationMechanismLabel: Are there major coordination mechanism in place?
strings.identifiedGapsHeading: Any identified gaps/limitations in the assessment
strings.peopleAssistedHeading: Who will be targeted through this operation?
strings.selectionCriteriaHeading: Explain the selection criteria for the targeted population
strings.riskSecurityHeading: Please analyse and indicate potential risks for this operation, its root causes and mitigation actions.
strings.safetyConcernHeading: Please indicate any security and safety concerns for this operation
strings.hasChildRiskCompleted: Has the child safeguarding risk analysis assessment been completed?
strings.humanResourcesHeading: How many staff and volunteers will be involved in this operation. Briefly describe their role.
strings.isVolunteerTeamDiverseHeading: Does your volunteer team reflect the gender, age, and cultural diversity of the people you’re helping? What gaps exist in your volunteer team’s gender, age, or cultural diversity, and how are you addressing them to ensure inclusive and appropriate support?
strings.hasAntiFraudPolicy: Does your National Society have anti-fraud and corruption policy?
strings.hasSexualAbusePolicy: Does your National Society have prevention of sexual exploitation and abuse policy?
strings.hasChildProtectionPolicy: Does your National Society have child protection/child safeguarding policy?
strings.hasWhistleblowerProtectionPolicy: Does your National Society have whistleblower protection policy?
strings.hasAntiSexualHarassmentPolicy: Does your National Society have anti-sexual harassment policy?
strings.surgePersonnelDeployedHeading: Will surge personnel be deployed? Please provide the role profile needed.
strings.logisticCapacityHeading: If there is procurement, will it be done by National Society or IFRC?
strings.pmerHeading: How will this operation be monitored?
strings.communicationHeading: Please briefly explain the National Societies communication strategy for this operation
strings.contactInformationSectionDescription: For further information, specifically related to this operation please contact:
strings.focalPointContactHeading: IFRC focal point for the emergency
